description: Analyze financial data, build financial models, and provide insights to support investment decisions and business strategy. Prepare reports and presentations for senior management and clients.
responsibilities: Build and maintain financial models (DCF, LBO, M&A); perform valuation and scenario analysis; prepare monthly management reports and variance analysis; analyze market trends and competitor performance; support budgeting and forecasting processes; conduct due diligence for investment opportunities; create presentations for stakeholders.
